actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that benefits determined under the special minimum primary insurance amount formula shall be increased, when other benefits payable under such title are increased, to take account of rises in the cost of living.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides, under the Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance program of the Social Security Act, that benefits determined under the special minimum primary insurance formula shall be increased, when other benefits payable under such title are increased, to take account of rises in the cost of living.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that benefits determined under the special minimum primary insurance amount formula shall be increased, when other benefits payable under such title are increased, to take account of rises in the cost of living.
